alert.note: Alert for Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 1:32PM EDT until August 03 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Sumter County in central South Carolina... * Until 200 PM EDT. * At 131 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Poinsett State Park, or 10 miles south of Shaw Air Base, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Poinsett State Park, Pinewood, Wedgewood, Rimini and Cane Savannah. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
